Journal Story: Arrived by Greyhound Bus to Gainesville,Georgia from Canton Ohio at 11:50 am. Ride waiting. Took me to Amicalola Park to sign in. Amicalola Falls stair were shut down for maintenance so shuttle driver offered to take me up top top of Springer. I arrived there at 3pm and hiked the 1 mi. To Start of Trail at the southern terminus and then hiked back and on to Stover Creek shelter for the night.
Overcast 60 degrees average with rain on and off most of the day.
40's in the morning getting up to 65 with overcast skies and fog.

Left Lance Creek and 7:30 am and hiked up and over Blood Mountain. Very foggy most of the day no view on top. Hiked down to Neel's Gap. Picked up resupply and had Trail Magic . Hiked the additional mile past to tent camp at Bull Gap camp.
Weather has finally had a few rays of sun 50's . Stayed in Tray Mountain Shelter with 4 other hikers.
Overcast skies with a few brief brakes of sunshine. 50-60. Class Act and myself had the whole Shelter to ourselves. Woke up to 36 degrees.

Was planning a Nero here. But bad weather coming in tomorrow and Thursday 2" of rain an winds 40 to 50 mile gusts. So I'll be taking 2 zero's. Free shuttles to town so was able to do Mexican lunch one day and dinner at buffet another. With a stop at grocery for small resupply. Plan on getting back on trail Friday the 2nd.
Destination: Top of Georgia Hiker Hostel and Supply

Start location: Top of Georgia Hiker Hostel and Supply
Top of Georgia Hiker Hostel and Supply

Journal Story: Sunny mid 40's for a high. Wind 10 to 15 mph. Dropped down to mid 20's at night.
Start location: Top of Georgia Hiker Hostel and Supply

Journal Story: Sunny with highs in the upper 40's dropping down to mid 20's at night.
26 degrees this morning. Got up into high 40's.
26 degrees this morning. Sunny with high upper low 50's. Nero today in Franklin, N.C. at Baltimore Jack's Hostel.
